mapper.select: select wordbook.wordbookname, wordbook.wordbookaccess, wordbook.wordbookmaker, wordbook.wordbookregdate from wordbook,directory,users where users.userno=directory.userno and directory.directoryno=wordbook.directoryno and directory.directoryname = #{directoryName} and users.id = #{URLId}

select wordbook.wordbookname, wordbook.wordbookaccess, wordbook.wordbookmaker, wordbook.wordbookregdate from wordbook,directory,users where users.userno=directory.userno and directory.directoryno=wordbook.directoryno and users.id = #{URLId}
